doc.title: A Modern Faerie Tale
doc.plot: Cameron, a young business executive is enjoying his lunch in the park when he makes an unexpected and unexplained acquaintance. Troy is your average barista, what sets him apart, however, are faerie wings and a mission. Cameron is unsure of his new friend and cautiously begins a dialogue that will change his world-view forever. Troy the Faerie believes in sharing the struggles as well as the good news about his special minority group, evidence of which is in the media. Cameron's skepticism is laid to rest as Troy the Faerie reveals to him a world that's been under his nose the whole time. And a struggle for rights not unlike those suffered by many special interest groups. Insights are learned and myths debunked. All except for one myth which is true to all faeries...
